rules.description: SpaceFN: Space + b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space + [hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SPaceFN: Space + [asdfgertuiop] to left_control + left_shift + left_option + left_command + [asdfgertuiop]
` to Esc, left_control + Esc to `, left_shift + Esc to ~
left_shift to left_control + spacebar (switch pervious input source)
right_command to left_shift + left_command + left_control + left_option
